subject: Basketball
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: St. John’s may have a long way to go until it is again a top men’s basketball program, but it appears that it will at least make this season’s Big East Conference tournament after beating Rutgers Thursday night.
snippet: St. John’s may have a long way to go until it is again a top men’s basketball program, but it appears that it will at least make this season’s Big East Conference tournament after beating Rutgers Thursday night.
